description: Wind, rain, sun—whatever the day throws your way, the Ether DriClime will keep you comfy. A DriClime® Bi-Component lining wicks away sweat while a versatile shell keeps wind and water at bay. Stuff it into its own pocket and toss it in your pack if the day gets too warm.
name: Marmot Ether DriClime Hoody - Mens
